Alternates.Title: Alternates View
Alternates.ShortHelp: Assigns or removes the alternates of an Item.
Alternates.LongHelp: To search and add an Item, right-click the header of an Item, and click <uicontrol>Add Alternates</uicontrol>.
AlternatesAndSubstitutes.Title: Alternates and Substitutes View
AlternatesAndSubstitutes.ShortHelp: Displays the engineering alternates and substitutes of an Item.
AlternatesAndSubstitutes.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Alternates and Substitutes View</uicontrol> to open the <wintitle>Alternates and Substitutes</wintitle> panel.
AssignAssembly.Title: Assign Product to Manufacturing Assembly
AssignAssembly.ShortHelp: Assigns a product or a part to a manufacturing assembly.
AssignAssembly.LongHelp: Select a product or a part and a manufacturing assembly and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
AssignKit.Title: Assign Product to Manufacturing Kit
AssignKit.ShortHelp: Assigns a product or a part to a Manufacturing Kit.
AssignKit.LongHelp: Select a product or a part and a Manufacturing Kit and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
AssignMaterial.Title: Assign Product to Manufactured Material
AssignMaterial.ShortHelp: Assigns a Product or a Part to a Manufactured Material.
AssignMaterial.LongHelp: Select a Product or a Part and a Manufactured Material and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
AssignProvide.Title: Assign Product to Provided Part
AssignProvide.ShortHelp: Assigns a product or a part to a provided part.
AssignProvide.LongHelp: Select a product or a part and a provided part and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
BIAltSub.Title: B.I. Essentials - Alternate & Substitute Status
BIAltSub.LongHelp: Color codes display according to whether an object has an alternate from Engineering or Manufacturing definitions.
BIEssentialsCmd.Title: B.I. Essentials - Assignment Status
BIEssentialsCmd.ShortHelp: Reveals the attributes of the objects in your session.
BIEssentialsCmd.LongHelp: Color codes corresponding to the different values of an attribute are applied to the objects.
BIMakeBuyStatus.Title: B.I. Essentials - Make/Buy Status
BIMakeBuyStatus.LongHelp: Color codes display according to whether an object has an Make/Buy from Engineering definitions.
CapableResource.Title: Capable Resources View
CapableResource.ShortHelp: Manages the Capable Resources related to an Item.
CapableResource.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Capable Resources View</uicontrol> to open the <wintitle>Capable Resources</wintitle> panel. To search and add a Resource, right-click on the header or a Resource, and click <uicontrol>Add Capable Resources</uicontrol>.
CollapseAll.Title: Collapse all
CollapseAll.ShortHelp: Collapses all objects in the tree or graph.
CollapseAll.LongHelp: Select a root object and click <uicontrol>Collapse all</uicontrol> to hide the objects under the root.
CreateAssemblyAndResultingProduct.Title: Create Manufacturing Assembly and Resulting Product Link
CreateAssemblyAndResultingProduct.ShortH: Creates a Manufacturing Assembly and a resulting product link.
CreateAssemblyAndResultingProduct.LongHe: Click <uicontrol>Create Manufacturing Assembly and Resulting Product Link</uicontrol>, enter a name and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateCapableResourceStructureLink.Title: Create Capable Resources Structure
CreateCapableResourceStructureLink.Short: Creates a resource object of the area type, and a capable resources structure link between the selected workplan/GeneralSystem/HeaderWorkplan and the created area.
CreateCapableResourceStructureLink.LongH: Select a workplan/GeneralSystem/HeaderWorkplan and click <uicontrol>Create Capable Resources Structure</uicontrol>.
CreateContinuousByProduct.Title: Create Continuous By-Product
CreateContinuousByProduct.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Continuous By-Product</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateContinuousManufacturedMaterial.Lon: Click <uicontrol>Create Continuous Manufactured Material</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertContinuousProvidedMaterial.Title: Create Continuous Provided Material
InsertContinuousProvidedMaterial.LongHel: Click <uicontrol>Create Continuous Provided Material</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateContinuousProvidedMaterialArea.Sho: Create a Continuous Provided Material - Area
CreateContinuousProvidedMaterialArea.Lon: Click <uicontrol>Create Continuous Provided Material - Area</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateContinuousProvidedMaterialAreaAndS: Create Continuous Provided Material - Area and Scope Link
Create a Continuous Provided Material - Area and Scope Link
Click <uicontrol>Create Continuous Provided Material - Area and Scope Link </uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateContinuousProvidedMaterialMass.Sho: Create a Continuous Provided Material - Mass
CreateContinuousProvidedMaterialMass.Lon: Click <uicontrol>Create Continuous Provided Material - Mass</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateContinuousProvidedMaterialMassAndS: Create Continuous Provided Material - Mass and Scope Link
Create a Continuous Provided Material - Mass and Scope Link
Click <uicontrol>Create Continuous Provided Material - Mass and Scope Link</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateContinuousProvidedMaterialLength.S: Create a Continuous Provided Material - Length
CreateContinuousProvidedMaterialLength.L: Click <uicontrol>Create Continuous Provided Material - Length</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateContinuousProvidedMaterialLengthAn: Create Continuous Provided Material - Length and Scope Link
Create a Continuous Provided Material - Length and Scope Link
Click <uicontrol>Create Continuous Provided Material - Length and Scope Link</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateContinuousProvidedMaterialVolume.S: Create a Continuous Provided Material - Volume
CreateContinuousProvidedMaterialVolume.L: Click <uicontrol>Create Continuous Provided Material - Volume</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateContinuousProvidedMaterialVolumeAn: Create Continuous Provided Material - Volume and Scope Link
Create a Continuous Provided Material - Volume and Scope Link
Click <uicontrol>Create Continuous Provided Material - Volume and Scope Link</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateInstance.Title: Create Instance
CreateInstance.ShortHelp: Creates or moves an instance interactively.
CreateInstance.LongHelp:
Select two objects and click Create Instance to create an instance link between the objects.

This command allows you to select several items at a time.
CreateKitAndResultingProduct.Title: Create Manufacturing Kit and Resulting Product Link
CreateKitAndResultingProduct.ShortHelp: Creates a Manufacturing Kit and a resulting product link.
CreateKitAndResultingProduct.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Manufacturing Kit and Resulting Product Link</uicontrol>, enter a name and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateLink.Title: Create Link
CreateLink.ShortHelp: Creates a link between an item and a product or a part.
CreateLink.LongHelp: This command allows you to create links between several items.
CreateMaterialAndResultingProduct.Title: Create Manufacturing Material and Resulting Product Link
CreateMaterialAndResultingProduct.ShortH: Creates a Manufacturing Material and a resulting product link.
CreateMaterialAndResultingProduct.LongHe: Click <uicontrol>Create Manufacturing Material and Resulting Product Link</uicontrol>, enter a name and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateMfgItemStructure.Title: Create Mfg Items Structure
CreateMfgItemStructure.ShortHelp:
Creates an MBOM structure from an EBOM structure with a scope link to a product or a part.

This command always create new structure. Consider using Update Mfg Items Structure command if structure is partially consumed.
CreateMfgItemStructure.LongHelp: Select a root Manufacturing Assembly and click <uicontrol>Create Mfg Items Structure</uicontrol>.
DELJobStatus.Title: Jobs View
DELJobStatus.LongHelp: Shows all the jobs submited by the logged in user
CreatePartialScopeLink.Title: Create Partial Scope Link
CreatePartialScopeLink.ShortHelp: Create a partial scope link between an item and a product or a part.
CreatePartialScopeLink.LongHelp: Select a manufacturing assembly and a product in the <wintitle>Engineering Items</wintitle> view, and click <uicontrol>Create Partial Scope Link</uicontrol> to create the partial scope link.
CreateProvideAndResultingProduct.Title: Create Provided Part and Resulting Product Link
CreateProvideAndResultingProduct.ShortHe: Creates a provided part and a resulting product link
CreateProvideAndResultingProduct.LongHel: Click <uicontrol>Create Provided Part and Resulting Product Link</uicontrol>, enter a name and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateScopeLink.Title: Create Scope Link
CreateScopeLink.ShortHelp: Creates a scope link between a manufacturing item and a product or a part.
CreateScopeLink.LongHelp: Select a manufacturing assembly and a product in the <wintitle>Engineering Items</wintitle> view, and click <uicontrol>Create Scope Link</uicontrol> to create the scope link.
DefineFilter.Title: Filter
DefineFilter.ShortHelp: Filters content based on attribute or configuration filters.
DefineFilter.LongHelp: Filter command is not available if Authoring is enabled or Filter command is not available in Database mode
Delete.Title: Delete Mfd Item(s)
Delete.LongHelp:
Select one or more objects and click the command.

If you select one object, to delete its children, select the Include structural objects option.
DeletePartialScopeLink.Title: Delete Partial Scope Link
DeletePartialScopeLink.ShortHelp: Deletes a partial scope link between a manufacturing item and a product or a part.
DeletePartialScopeLink.LongHelp: Select a manufacturing Item with a partial scope link and click <uicontrol>Delete Partial Scope Link</uicontrol>.
DeleteScopeLink.Title: Delete Scope Link
DeleteScopeLink.ShortHelp: Deletes a scope link between an Item and a Product or a Part.
DeleteScopeLink.LongHelp: Select a manufacturing Item with a scope link and click <uicontrol>Delete Scope Link</uicontrol>.
DetachInstance.Title: Detach Instance
DetachInstance.ShortHelp: Deletes an instance from the current structure.
DetachInstance.LongHelp: Select an object and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol> to confirm the deletion.
DisplayProperties.Title: Edit information
DisplayProperties.ShortHelp: Displays the information of an object.
DisplayProperties.LongHelp: Select an object and click <uicontrol>Edit information</uicontrol> to view its properties.
DuplicateAdv.Title: Advanced Duplicate
DuplicateAdv.ShortHelp: Duplicates a manufactured item with the option of keeping related links.
DuplicateAdv.LongHelp: Select a manufactured item and click <uicontrol>Advanced Duplicate</uicontrol>.
Authoring.Title: Authoring Mode
Authoring.ShortHelp: Switches from the Index mode to the Authoring mode, and vice versa. In the Index mode, objects are retrieved from the Cloud View index. In the Authoring mode, objects are retrieved from the 3DSpace database.
Authoring.LongHelp: Enabling the Authoring mode disables the <uicontrol>Filter</uicontrol> command.
EditConfigurationContext.Title: Edit Configuration Context
EditConfigurationContext.ShortHelp: Adds or removes a model as a configuration context.
EditConfigurationContext.LongHelp: Opens the <wintitle>Edit Configuration Context</wintitle> dialog box for the object so that you can add or remove a model as its configuration context.
EditEvolution.Title: Edit Evolution Effectivity
EditEvolution.ShortHelp: Adds or edits the model version revisions that define evolution effectivity for an object in the structure.
EditEvolution.LongHelp: Opens the <wintitle>Edit Evolution</wintitle> dialog box for the object so that you can select which model version revisions define the object's evolution effectivity.
EditVariant.Title: Edit Variants and Options Effectivity
EditVariant.ShortHelp: Adds or edits the variants and options effectivity for an object in the structure.
EditVariant.LongHelp: Opens the <wintitle>Define Variant/Option</wintitle> dialog box for the object so that you can add or edit variants and options to define the variants and options effectivity expression.
EditViewPreferences.Title: Show Column(s) View Preferences Panel
EditViewPreferences.ShortHelp: Lets you define which columns are displayed in the widget.
EditViewPreferences.LongHelp: In the <wintitle>Is Visible</wintitle> column, select the check box of the columns you want to display on the interface, and clear the check box of the columns you want to hide. You can manually adjust the width of the columns.
ExpandAll.Title: Expand All
ExpandAll.ShortHelp: Expands all objects in the tree or graph.
ExpandAll.LongHelp: Select a root object and click <uicontrol>Expand All</uicontrol> to view the objects under the root.
ExportCSV.Title: Export Table as CSV File
ExportCSV.ShortHelp: Exports management data to a CSV file.
ExportCSV.LongHelp: Select one or more objects and click <uicontrol>Export CSV</uicontrol>.
Hide.Title: Remove selected object(s) from views
Hide.ShortHelp: Hides the selected root node from the interface.
HideAll.Title: Close all object(s)
HideAll.ShortHelp: Close all the objects from the view.
InsertAlert.Title: Create Alert Instruction
InsertAlert.ShortHelp: Create an alert work instruction whenever you want to warn workers about safety or equipment concerns in an operation.
InsertAlert.LongHelp: Select an operation, and click <uicontrol>Create Alert Instruction</uicontrol>. In the dialog box, rename the instruction, and set the desired options; click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>. You can create as many alert instructions per operation as you need.
InsertArea.Title: Create Area
InsertArea.ShortHelp: Inserts an area resource, which is an organizational resource.
InsertArea.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Area</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertAsCopy.Title: Insert as Copy
InsertAsCopy.ShortHelp: Adds an Item from the IP Classify and Reuse app as an instance.
InsertAsCopy.LongHelp: Select an Item from the IP Classify and Reuse app and click Insert As Copy to add as copy under the selected Item.
InsertBufferSystem.Title: Create Buffer System
InsertBufferSystem.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Buffer System</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertControlDevice.Title: Create Control Equipment
InsertControlDevice.ShortHelp: Inserts a control equipment resource, which is a working resource.
InsertControlDevice.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Control Equipment</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertConveyor.Title: Create Conveyor
InsertConveyor.ShortHelp: Inserts a conveyor resource, which is a working resource.
InsertConveyor.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Conveyor</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertCreateAssembly.Title: Create Manufacturing Assembly
InsertCreateAssembly.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Manufacturing Assembly</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertCreateKit.Title: Create Manufacturing Kit
InsertCreateKit.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Manufacturing Kit</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertCreateMaterial.Title: Create Manufactured Material
InsertCreateMaterial.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Manufactured Material</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertCurveFasteningOperation.Title: Create Curve Fastening Operation
InsertCurveFasteningOperation.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Curve Fastening Operation</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertDataCollectChecklist.Title: Create Data Collect Checklist Instruction
InsertDataCollectChecklist.ShortHelp: Create a Data Collect composed of Boolean checks to be performed.
InsertDataCollectChecklist.LongHelp: Select an operation, and click <uicontrol>Create Data Collect Checklist Instruction</uicontrol>. In the create dialog box, rename the instruction and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>, which opens a Data Collect Checklist dialog box where you can add appropriate data collect information.
InsertDataCollectPlan.Title: Create Data Collect Plan Instruction
InsertDataCollectPlan.ShortHelp: Create work instructions that direct workers to provide information such as inventory tracking or defect counts
InsertDataCollectPlan.LongHelp: Select an operation, and click <uicontrol>Create Data Collect Plan Instruction</uicontrol>. In the create dialog box, rename the instruction and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>, which opens a Data Collect Plan dialog box where you can add appropriate data collect information.
InsertDiscreteByProduct.Title: Create By-Product
InsertDiscreteByProduct.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create By-Product</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertGeneralOperation.Title: Create General Operation
InsertGeneralOperation.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create General Operation</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertGeneralSystem.Title: Create General System
InsertGeneralSystem.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create General System</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertHeaderOperation.Title: Create Header Operation
InsertHeaderOperation.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Header Operation</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertHeaderWorkplanSystem.Title: Create Header Workplan
InsertHeaderWorkplanSystem.LongHelp:
Click Create Header Workplan, enter a title, and click Create.

Header Workplans can be created only as root and can have Workplan Systems and Quality Control Processes as children.
InsertIndustrialMachine.Title: Create Industrial Machine
InsertIndustrialMachine.ShortHelp: Inserts an industrial machine resource, which is a working resource.
InsertIndustrialMachine.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Industrial Machine</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertInspect.Title: Create Inspect
InsertInspect.ShortHelp: Inserts an inspect resource, which is a working resource.
InsertInspect.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Inspect</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertInstallation.Title: Create Installation
InsertInstallation.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Installation</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertInstruction.Title: Create Text Instruction
InsertInstruction.ShortHelp: Creates a non-specific instruction that can have different attachments and views associated with it.
InsertInstruction.LongHelp: Select an operation, and click <uicontrol>Create Text Instruction</uicontrol>. In the dialog box, rename the instruction, and add the text; click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertLoadingOperation.Title: Create Loading Operation
InsertLoadingOperation.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Loading Operation </uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertLogicController.Title: Create Logic Controller
InsertLogicController.ShortHelp: Inserts a logic controller resource, which is a working resource.
InsertLogicController.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Logic Controller</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertManufacturingSetup.Title: Create Manufacturing Setup
InsertManufacturingSetup.ShortHelp: Inserts a manufacturing product resource, which is a nonworking resource.
InsertManufacturingSetup.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Manufacturing Setup</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertNCMachine.Title: Create NC Machine
InsertNCMachine.ShortHelp: Inserts an NC machine resource, which is a working resource.
InsertNCMachine.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create NC Machine</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertOrganizational.Title: Create Manufacturing Cell
InsertOrganizational.ShortHelp: Inserts a manufacturing cell resource, which is an organizational resource.
InsertOrganizational.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Manufacturing Cell</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertPointFasteningOperation.Title: Create Point Fastening Operation
InsertPointFasteningOperation.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Point Fastening Operation</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertProvide.Title: Create Provided Part
InsertProvide.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Provided Part</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertCreateMaterialProcessContinuous.Lo: Click <uicontrol>Create Continuous Manufactured Material</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertQualityControlProcess.Title: Create Quality Control Process
InsertQualityControlProcess.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Quality Control Process</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertRemoveMaterialOperation.Title: Create Remove Material Operation
InsertRemoveMaterialOperation.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Remove Material Operation</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertRobot.Title: Create Robot
InsertRobot.ShortHelp: Inserts a robot resource, which is a working resource.
InsertRobot.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Robot</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertResourceParameterPlan.Title: Create Resource Parameter Plan
InsertResourceParameterPlan.ShortHelp: Create Resource Parameter Plan that help in devising the Resource Parameter Plan
InsertResourceParameterPlan.LongHelp: Select an operation, and click <uicontrol>Create Resource Parameter Plan</uicontrol>. In the create dialog box, rename the Plan and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>, which opens a Resource Parameter Plan dialog box where you can add appropriate Resource Parameter Plan information.
InsertSensor.Title: Create Sensor
InsertSensor.ShortHelp: Inserts a sensor resource, which is a nonworking resource.
InsertSensor.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Sensor</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertSignOff.Title: Create Sign Off Instruction
InsertSignOff.ShortHelp: Create work instructions that require a sign off as part of the work process.
InsertSignOff.LongHelp: Select an operation, and click <uicontrol>Create Signoff Instruction</uicontrol>. In the dialog box, rename the instruction, and set the desired options; click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertSinkSystem.Title: Create Sink System
InsertSinkSystem.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Sink System</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertSourceSystem.Title: Create Source System
InsertSourceSystem.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Source System</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertStorage.Title: Create Storage
InsertStorage.ShortHelp: Inserts a storage resource, which is a nonworking resource.
InsertStorage.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Storage</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertToolDevice.Title: Create Tool Equipment
InsertToolDevice.ShortHelp: Inserts a tool equipment resource, which is a nonworking resource.
InsertToolDevice.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Tool Equipment</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertTransferOperation.Title: Create Transfer Operation
InsertTransferOperation.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Transfer Operation</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertTransferSystem.Title: Create Transfer System
InsertTransferSystem.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Transfer System</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertTransformationSystem.Title: Create Transformation System
InsertTransformationSystem.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Transformation System</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertTransport.Title: Create Transport
InsertTransport.ShortHelp: Inserts a transport resource, which is a working resource.
InsertTransport.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Transport</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertUnloadingOperation.Title: Create Unloading Operation
InsertUnloadingOperation.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Unloading Operation</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertUserDefined.Title: Create User Defined Resource
InsertUserDefined.ShortHelp: Inserts a user-defined resource, which is a nonworking resource.
InsertUserDefined.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create User Defined Resource</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertWorker.Title: Create Worker
InsertWorker.ShortHelp: Inserts a worker resource, which is a working resource.
InsertWorker.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Worker</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertWorkplanSystem.Title: Create Workplan
InsertWorkplanSystem.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Workplan</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
ItemsView.Title: Show Items View
ItemsView.ShortHelp: Shows or hides the <wintitle> Items</wintitle> view, that is, the Items block.
LandingPage.Title: Home
LayoutPreferences.Title: Show View Layout Preferences Panel
LayoutPreferences.ShortHelp: Lets you manage widget layout preferences.
LoadRelations.Title: Load Relations
LoadRelations.ShortHelp: Loads in the session the connections of the selected items and their parents to the root.
LoadRelations.LongHelp: This command is disabled by default. It is only available if, in the <wintitle>Edit preferences</wintitle> panel, <wintitle>Navigate On</wintitle> is set to <uicontrol>Index (Load relations on-demand)</uicontrol>.
UserDefinedExplore.Title: User Defined Explore
UserDefinedExplore.ShortHelp: Opens a <wintitle>User Defined Explore</wintitle> dialog box.
UserDefinedExplore.LongHelp:
From the List of all Procedures field, select either the default entry prompting Load Relations in Views, or one of the available user-defined (JavaScript) procedures. On clicking Execute, this procedure is executed with the selected objects as input, and the returned objects are loaded in the respective views.

  • The availabilty of the procedures depends on the selected object. If no object is selected, the dialog does not display, and the default behavior Load Relations in Views is executed.
  • The user-defined procedures must include a ProcCategory property with the Custo value before being deployed in the server to be included in the list.
ManageCapableResources.Title: Manage Capable Resources
ManageCapableResources.ShortHelp: Manages links between capable resources and system/operation
ManageCapableResources.LongHelp: Select a system/operation and click on the command. Create a primary/secondary capable resource link by dragging the resource from the <wintitle>Capable Resources</wintitle> view or from search.
ManageInconsistentLinks.Title: Change Impact Management
ManageInconsistentLinks.ShortHelp: Manages incomplete or inconsistent implement links between Products and Items.
ManageInconsistentLinks.LongHelp: The <wintitle>Change Impact Management</wintitle> panel lists inconsistent implement links between Products and Items.
ManufacturingItems.Title: Manufacturing Items View
ManufacturingItems.ShortHelp: Displays or hides the <wintitle>Manufactured Items</wintitle> view.
Origin.Title: Origins View
Origin.ShortHelp: Assigns or removes origin links to or from an Item.
Origin.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Origins View</uicontrol> to open the <wintitle>Origins</wintitle> panel. To search and add an origin, right-click the header or an Item, and click <uicontrol>Add Origins</uicontrol>.
ProcessView.Title: Show Processes & Operations View
ProcessView.ShortHelp: Shows or hides the <wintitle>Processes & Operations</wintitle> view, that is, the Routings block.
ProcessValidationCmd.Title: Process Validation
ProcessValidationCmd.ShortHelp: Analyzes the selected workplan structure and associated linked objects to ensure compatibility with scheduling and execution applications.
ProductFlowCmd.Title: Process Flow Diagram
ProductFlowCmd.ShortHelp: Opens a panel to manage the view of the structure.
ProductFlowCmd.LongHelp: Click to display the Process Flow Diagram.
SwimLaneChartCmd.Title: Swimlane Chart View
SwimLaneChartCmd.ShortHelp: Displays the details of the process or operation structure.
SwimLaneChartCmd.LongHelp: Select an <wintitle>Operation</wintitle> or a <wintitle>Workplan</wintitle> and click on <wintitle>Swimlane Chart View</wintitle> to display the <wintitle>Swimlane Chart</wintitle> panel. This displays the panel in a separate frame.
ProcedureViewCmd.Title: Procedure View
ProcedureViewCmd.ShortHelp: Displays the text content of systems, operations and work instructions.
ProcedureViewCmd.LongHelp: Select a Service Workplan and click on Procedure View to display the Procedure View panel. This displays the panel in a separate frame.
ProductsParts.Title: Engineering Items View
ProductsParts.ShortHelp: Displays or hides the <wintitle>Engineering Items</wintitle> view.
ReconnectScope.Title: Reconnect Scope Link
ReconnectScope.ShortHelp: Reconnects a scope link between a manufacturing item and a product or a part.
ReconnectScope.LongHelp: In the dialog box, select a manufacturing item, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol> to fix a broken scope.
Reframe.Title: Reframe
Reframe.ShortHelp: Fits the entire structure into the view.
Reframe.LongHelp: In the graph view, click <uicontrol>Reframe</uicontrol> to fit the structure into the view.
ReframeOn.Title: Reframe On
ReframeOn.ShortHelp: Centers the view on the selected object.
ReframeOn.LongHelp: In the graph view, select an object and click <uicontrol>Reframe On</uicontrol> to center the view on this object.
Refresh.Title: Refresh Selected Object(s) from Database
Refresh.ShortHelp: Applies the latest modifications to the selected object(s).
RelationalExplorerCmd.Title: Related Object(s)
RelationalExplorerCmd.ShortHelp: Enables you to navigate scope links and implement links of an object.
RelationalExplorerCmd.LongHelp: Select an object and click <uicontrol>Related Object(s)</uicontrol>.
Relations.Title: Relations Panel
Relations.ShortHelp: Displays the identifier of the object linked to an item.
ReplaceByExisting.Title: Replace By Existing
ReplaceByExisting.ShortHelp: Replaces a child manufacturing item with an existing manufacturing item, updates scope and implement links.
ReplaceByExisting.LongHelp: Select a child manufacturing item and click <uicontrol>Replace by Existing</uicontrol>. In the search bar, enter the criteria for an existing manufacturing item in the database. Select the manufacturing item and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
ReplaceByLatestRevision.Title: Replace By Latest Revision
ReplaceByLatestRevision.ShortHelp: Replaces a child manufacturing item with its latest revision, updates scope and implement links.
ReplaceByLatestRevision.LongHelp: Select a child manufacturing item and click <uicontrol>Replace by Latest Revision</uicontrol>.
ReplaceByNewReference.Title: Replace By New
ReplaceByNewReference.ShortHelp: Replaces an instance of a reference by an instance of a new reference.
ReplaceByNewRevision.Title: Replace By New Revision
ReplaceByNewRevision.ShortHelp: Creates a new revision of a child manufacturing item, replaces the manufacturing item with the new revision, updates scope and implement links.
ReplaceByNewRevision.LongHelp: Select a child manufacturing item and click <uicontrol>Replace by New Revision</uicontrol>.
ReplaceWhereUsed.Title: Actions Where Used
ReplaceWhereUsed.ShortHelp: Massively modify actions on the instances of a manufacturing and system structure.
ReplaceWhereUsed.LongHelp: Select an action per usage and click <uicontrol>Apply</uicontrol> to confirm the modifications.
ResourcesView.Title: Show Capable Resource View
ResourcesView.ShortHelp: Shows or hides the <wintitle>Capable Resource</wintitle> view, that is, the Capable Resources block.
ResultingProduct.Title: Resulting Product View
ResultingProduct.ShortHelp: Displays the <wintitle>Resulting Product</wintitle> panel. Click on the icon to toggle the <wintitle>Resulting Product</wintitle> view.
ResultingProduct.LongHelp: Select an Item and click Resulting Product View to display the Resulting Product panel. This displays the resulting Product in a separate frame. You can then drop the Product into the view to display more information.
ReviseAndReconnectScope.Title: Revise and Reconnect Scope Link
ReviseAndReconnectScope.ShortHelp: Provides quick access to the latest Replacing Manufactured Items icon used.
SearchAndAddInstanceCommand.Title: Insert
SearchAndAddInstanceCommand.ShortHelp: Adds an instance to an Item or selects an Item from the IP Classify and Reuse app.
SearchAndAddInstanceCommand.LongHelp: In the search bar, enter the name of your instance. Select the instance from the database and click Search, or select an Item from the IP Classify and Reuse app and click Insert.
SetThePartNumber.Title: Enterprise Item Number on Items
SetThePartNumber.ShortHelp: Defines the Enterprise Item Number on Items
SetThePartNumber.LongHelp: Select one or several items to set their Enterprise Item Numbers. An Enterprise Item Number is a unique string of alphanumeric characters. You can define an Enterprise Item Number onto an Item reference to distinguish this Item from all others Items in the system.
ShowGraphView.Title: Show Graph View
ShowGraphView.ShortHelp: Displays the graph view with the links between objects.
ShowGraphView.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Show Graph View</uicontrol> to toggle the view to graph.
ShowGroupingDataGridView.Title: Grouping View
ShowGroupingDataGridView.ShortHelp: Shows a view to perform structural or procurement grouping on Items.
ShowGroupingDataGridView.LongHelp: Right-click on the header columns in the Grouping View to apply grouping based on a chosen criteria from the context menu.
ShowLogPanel.Title: Show Log Panel
ShowLogPanel.ShortHelp: Opens a panel listing previous actions.
ShowLogPanel.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Log Panel</uicontrol> to display the <wintitle>Log</wintitle> panel.
StretchPartialScopeLink.Title: Stretch Partial Scope Link
StretchPartialScopeLink.ShortHelp: Stretch existing partial scope link between a manufacturing item and a product or a part to upper level of the currently scoped product.
StretchPartialScopeLink.LongHelp: Select a manufacturing assembly and a product in the <wintitle>Products and Parts</wintitle> view, and click <uicontrol>Stretch Partial Scope Link</uicontrol> to stretch the partial scope link to upper level.
Substitutes.Title: Substitutes View
Substitutes.ShortHelp: Assigns or removes the substitutes of an Item.
Substitutes.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Substitutes View</uicontrol> to open the <wintitle>Substitutes</wintitle> panel. To search and add a substitute, right-click the header or an Item, and click <uicontrol>Add Substitute</uicontrol>.
Responsibility.Title: Manufacturing Responsibility View
Responsibility.ShortHelp: Assigns or removes the manufacturing responsibility link between Item and manufacturer.
Responsibility.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Manufacturing Responsibility View</uicontrol> to open the <wintitle>Responsibility</wintitle> panel. To search and add a manufacturing responsibility, right-click the header or an Item, and click <uicontrol>Add Manufacturing Responsibility</uicontrol>.
SwitchToFullScopeLink.Title: Switch Partial Scope Link
SwitchToFullScopeLink.ShortHelp: Converts the existing partial scope link for a Item to a full scope link.
SwitchToFullScopeLink.LongHelp: Switch the existing partial scope link between the selected Item and a product to full scope link.
ToggleAuxiliaryView.Title: Auxiliary View
ToggleAuxiliaryView.ShortHelp: Opens the <wintitle>Auxiliary</wintitle> view to manage unclassified objects.
ToggleGraphView.Title: Toggle Graph and Table View
ToggleGraphView.ShortHelp: Displays the structure through a tree or a graph.
ToggleGraphView.LongHelp: Click the Items view, and click Toggle Graph and Table View to toggle the view to a graph.
ToggleOrientation.Title: Toggle Graph Orientation
ToggleOrientation.ShortHelp: Changes the position and order of objects in a structure.
ToggleOrientation.LongHelp: In the graph view, click <uicontrol>Toggle Graph Orientation</uicontrol> to change the order of objects.
ToggleOverview.Title: Toggle Graph Overview
ToggleOverview.ShortHelp: Opens a panel to manage the view of the structure.
ToggleOverview.LongHelp: In the graph view, click <uicontrol>Toggle Graph Overview</uicontrol> to manually adjust the size of a structure.
UnassignProduct.Title: Unassign Product
UnassignProduct.ShortHelp: Unassigns a product or a part from a manufacturing item.
UnassignProduct.LongHelp: Select a product or a part, and click <uicontrol>Unassign Product</uicontrol> to remove it from the manufactured item.
UpdateMfgItemStructure.Title: Update Items Structure
UpdateMfgItemStructure.ShortHelp: Updates an item that has a scope link to a product or a part with another revision.
UpdateMfgItemStructure.LongHelp: In the dialog box, select a revision, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertServiceWorkplanSystem.Title: Create Service Workplan
InsertServiceWorkplanSystem.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Service Workplan</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertServiceHeaderWorkplanSystem.Title: Create Service Header Workplan
InsertServiceHeaderWorkplanSystem.ShortH: Creates a Service Header Workplan system.
InsertServiceHeaderWorkplanSystem.LongHe: Click <uicontrol>Create Service Header Workplan</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
DELCreateEngineeringMadeFromItem.Title: Create Item Made from Following Engineering Specification
DELCreateEngineeringMadeFromItem.ShortHe: Creates an Item for a Transform,Manufactured Part, and Manufactured Material implementing a Product a with 'Made From' link.
Requirement.Title: Requirements View
Requirement.ShortHelp: Consume or removes requirements links to or from an Item or Process.
Requirement.LongHelp: Select an Item or Process and click on <uicontrol>Requirements View</uicontrol> to display the <wintitle>Requirements</wintitle> panel. This displays the panel in a separate frame.
InsertWarning.Title: Create Warning Instruction
InsertWarning.ShortHelp: Create a warning work instruction whenever you want to warn workers about safety or equipment concerns in an operation.
InsertWarning.LongHelp: Select an operation, and click <uicontrol>Create Warning Instruction</uicontrol>. In the dialog box, rename the instruction, and set the desired options; click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>. You can create as many alert instructions per operation as you need.
InsertCaution.Title: Create Caution Instruction
InsertCaution.ShortHelp: Create a caution work instruction whenever you want to caution workers about safety or equipment concerns in an operation.
InsertCaution.LongHelp: Select an operation, and click <uicontrol>Create Caution Instruction</uicontrol>. In the dialog box, rename the instruction, and set the desired options; click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>. You can create as many alert instructions per operation as you need.
InsertNote.Title: Create Note Instruction
InsertNote.ShortHelp: Create a note work instruction whenever you want to add note to workers about safety or equipment concerns in an operation.
InsertNote.LongHelp: Select an operation, and click <uicontrol>Create Note Instruction</uicontrol>. In the dialog box, rename the instruction, and set the desired options; click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>. You can create as many alert instructions per operation as you need.
InsertOperationalWorkplan.Title: Create Operational Workplan
InsertOperationalWorkplan.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Operational Workplan</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertRectifyingWorkplan.Title: Create Rectifying Workplan
InsertRectifyingWorkplan.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Rectifying Workplan</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertSupportingWorkplan.Title: Create Supporting Workplan
InsertSupportingWorkplan.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Supporting Workplan</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
